definition: to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Diddle the switch see if the light comes on.
sentences.chinese: 上下快速撥動電燈開關看看是否來電了。

sentences.english: A sleek and glossy feel of a magazine template can really hit the right chords with a user.
sentences.chinese: 優美的雜誌模板的確可以撥動用戶的心絃。

sentences.english: In this photo, we see scratches where the pick tool was used to lift the pin.
sentences.chinese: 在插圖中我們可以看到單鉤在撥動珠子是留下的劃痕。

sentences.english: The ashes were quickened into flames.
sentences.chinese: 撥動灰燼使火苗燃燒起來。

sentences.english: When you struck my heartstring in the dream.
sentences.chinese: 當你在夢裏撥動我的心絃。

sentences.english: My mechanical fingers exchange the powerless resistance.
sentences.chinese: 機械式的節支手指，撥動着最無力的反抗。

sentences.english: Now strum the chord any way you like, and record it.
sentences.chinese: 現在你喜歡的任何方法撥動弦，並錄下它。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to chat with a low voice
to echo one another/to respond (in agreement)
to flip over/to turn (a page)/to scroll (an electronic document)/to stir (food in a pot etc)/to move things about/to rummage
